Reviews.Title: Does what it's supposed to!
Reviews.Author: Cameron Trammell
Reviews.Content: I have to say this is just as advertised. Make sure you have a mini SD card. Put it on my RC18MT and had a blast. So much fun to use! I was surprised because one of the reviews was bad, and it turned out just fine! 100% recommend this product! Thanks again!-Cam

Reviews.Title: this is nice
Reviews.Author: Mark Kissoon
Reviews.Content: it's good...it does what its supposed too.it blends right in as a flash drive. i keep it on me all the time

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: grayma
Reviews.Content: I love this cam. I really needed several and this one works like a workhorse over the others.I need to figure out how to make it record longer

Reviews.Title: No Instructions, save your money
Reviews.Author: R. Sammon
Reviews.Content: I should have saved my money on this item...it was supposed to be a neat addition to a higher end RC car for my son.  It took so much time to research how it is supposed to work, he and I lost interest in trying to make it work.  Such a waste of money.  Can I make this no stars?
